interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Study Buddy Clay Mask with Detoxifying Bentonite, 3 fl. oz., Exfoliates, Brightens and Clears Pores, Clay Draws Out Impurities and Improves Skin's Texture and Tone by Higher Education Skincare
Review Date: 2020/09/02
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Scent': 'Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381035006'}
Review Text: I love a good face mask - this hits all the marks for me. It is thick and basically feels like wet pottery in your hands (hence the clay), smells nice (somewhat perfume-y) and most importantly, feels like something I’d get at a spa. When I first put it on, I was surprised by the warming sensation, since I didn’t realize it had that effect. I liked it! I’ve had masks like that before and they just add another dimension to the experience. I left it on for 10 minutes and washed it right off. Some clay masks I’ve used are hard to wash off - not this one. Face felt smooth and had no irritation afterward. I really like this brand.
Review Title: Warming sensation is so good
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'}
I like the smell of this and how light it is. It does kinda feel like jelly and doesn’t lather up super great for me, but it gets the job done and makes my face feel good. Haven’t broken out or had irritated skin from it. The smell is light and reminds me of something I can’t put my finger on...maybe light citrus candy or something? It smells pretty good to me and I enjoy washing with this in the shower. Good size too!
A pleasant, non-irritating face wash

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Concern:** Prefers products suitable for dry and sensitive skin, emphasizing non-irritating formulations.
- **Product Functionality:** Values gentle, effective cleansing that maintains skin hydration without causing breakouts or irritation. Recently appreciated a clay mask that detoxifies and improves skin texture, indicating openness to products with exfoliating benefits when they are gentle on the skin.
- **Scent Preference:** Enjoys light, pleasant scents, particularly reminiscent of citrus or sweet notes, and has shown a preference for products with spa-like, luxurious scents during recent usage.
- **Texture Preference:** Favors lightweight textures, though expresses enjoyment of thick, clay-like textures in the context of masks, suggesting a balanced appreciation for various formulations that enhance the sensory experience.
- **Usage Context:** Likely integrates skincare routines into daily activities like showering, seeking convenient, easy-to-use products, while also appreciating indulgent treatments like masks that can enhance self-care moments.
- **Purchase Consideration:** Evaluates products based on a balance of quality performance and pleasurable sensory experience, with recent feedback indicating a strong preference for brands that provide a pampering experience and effective results without irritation.

Overall, the user maintains a clear inclination towards gentleness, sensory pleasure, and effective skincare solutions suitable for sensitive skin, with an emerging appreciation for the benefits of gentle exfoliation.
